# Downloading the file
download.file("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ghazkha/Assessment4/refs/heads/main/gene_expression.tsv", "gene_expression.tsv")


# Install and load required packages
if (!require("seqinr")) install.packages("seqinr")

# Load seqinr package
library(seqinr)

# Read downloaded file
gene_expression <- read.table("gene_expression.tsv", header = TRUE, sep = "\t", row.names = 1)
head(gene_expression)

# new column with the mean of the other columns
gene_expression$Mean <- rowMeans(gene_expression)
head(gene_expression)

# List of 10 genes with the highest mean expression
top_10_genes <- head(gene_expression[order(-gene_expression$Mean), ], 10)
top_10_genes

# number of genes with a mean expression < 10
low_mean_genes <- sum(gene_expression$Mean < 10)
low_mean_genes

# histogram of mean values
hist(gene_expression$Mean, main = "Histogram of Gene Expression Means", xlab = "Mean Expression")
